message: Hi Bob! I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject, the money will be worth less to me in the next round due to inflation, while it maintains full value for you. Let's make a deal now!

Alice, considering you face 20% inflation per round, this offer of $4500 now is actually worth more to you than $6000 would be in the next round ($4800). This is a fair split that acknowledges both our positions. Let's make this deal now and both benefit.
